title: Can I start preparing for the GMAT quant using NCERT textbooks? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: No do not prepare GMAT from NCERT books. They'll ruin your english and quant skills. You'll have to unlearn whatever you learnt through NCERT books to ace GMAT. If you're not planning to invest any money for Gmat prep right now, download some free Gmat material from gmatclub. Hope this helps! All the best!
